name: The Morning After Christmas
description:
The Morning After Christmas is a game that is based on is the tsunami disaster in Asia in 2004. The tsunami was one of the 10 deadliest natural disasters in history,  where about 227,900 people died (5,300 on the Thai coast).  

"I was six years old but I still remember what the aftermath looked like. I remember hearing the most intense personal experiences from the many locals and tourists that were there. Some of the stories made it to the news and some to movies but many vanished. Even though this was done as a class assignment I wanted my game to be educational and meaningful.

In memorial of those who lost their lives in the tsunami of 2004."

- Tara Boonngamanong
